training_data.requirement: Kindly provide chemical dump for 2007 site production server as per attached excel T_ARRIVAL_DATE ENTRY_NAME QUANTITY INVENTORY_TYPE T_EXPIRATION_DATE GROUP_NAME ACTIVE DISPLAYED POTENCY T_DISPOSAL_DATE T_RETEST_DATE T_USE_START_DATE C_ARRIVAL_DATE C_DISPATCH_BY C_DISPATCH_DATE C_DISPATCHED_QTY C_DISPATCHED_TO C_RECEIVED_BY C_RECEIVED_DATE T_DISPOSAL_DATE STOCK DESCRIPTION T_SUPPLIER C_INV_GRADE T_SUPPLIER_LOT T_NOTE T_MAKER T_SERIAL_NUMBER 24-10-2018 00:00 CHE/F-3/18/007-00001 0 CHEMICALS 24-10-2023 00:00 2007 T F 00:00.0 21-10-2020 00:00 NULL 24-10-2018 11:30 NULL LOKESH_14720 24-10-2018 11:30 25 2007 LOKESH_14720 24-10-2018 11:30 21-10-2020 00:00 CHEMICAL_141 NULL NULL NULL 1873530417 NULL FISCHER_SCIENTIFIC NULL
training_data.sql_query: SELECT top 1 b.ENTRY_NAME, a.QUANTITY, b.INVENTORY_TYPE, T_EXPIRATION_DATE, b.GROUP_NAME, a.ACTIVE, b.DISPLAYED, b.POTENCY, b.T_DISPOSAL_DATE, b.T_RETEST_DATE, T_USE_START_DATE, b.C_ARRIVAL_DATE, C_DISPATCH_BY, b.C_DISPATCH_DATE, b.C_DISPATCHED_QTY, b.C_DISPATCHED_TO, C_RECEIVED_BY, C_RECEIVED_DATE, b.T_DISPOSAL_DATE, a.STOCK, b.DESCRIPTION, a.T_SUPPLIER, a.C_INV_GRADE, a.T_SUPPLIER_LOT, a.T_NOTE, a.T_MAKER, a.T_SERIAL_NUMBER, T_ARRIVAL_DATE, ENTRY_NAME FROM INVENTORY_ENTRY b INNER JOIN INVENTORY_ITEM a ON a.ITEM_NUMBER = b.ITEM_NUMBER where b.GROUP_NAME = '2007' and a.STOCK like '%chemical%'

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide column dump for 2007 site production server as per attached excel T_ARRIVAL_DATE ENTRY_NAME QUANTITY INVENTORY_TYPE T_EXPIRATION_DATE GROUP_NAME ACTIVE DISPLAYED POTENCY T_DISPOSAL_DATE T_RETEST_DATE T_USE_START_DATE C_ARRIVAL_DATE C_DISPATCH_BY C_DISPATCH_DATE C_DISPATCHED_QTY C_DISPATCHED_TO C_RECEIVED_BY C_RECEIVED_DATE T_DISPOSAL_DATE STOCK DESCRIPTION T_SUPPLIER C_INV_GRADE T_SUPPLIER_LOT T_NOTE T_MAKER T_SERIAL_NUMBER 28-11-2018 00:00 LC/F-3/00013-00001 1 NULL NULL 2007 T T 0 NULL NULL 10-09-2019 16:27 NULL AMIT_17720 09-09-2019 11:07 0 2007 KRISHANPAL_14901 10-09-2019 16:27 NULL COLUMN_88 Symmetry shield RP-18 (250 X 4.6) mm, 5 µm WATERS NULL 211380961 Bepotastine Besilate/Test:RS WATERS 2.11381E+12
training_data.sql_query: SELECT top 1 b.ENTRY_NAME, a.QUANTITY, b.INVENTORY_TYPE, T_EXPIRATION_DATE, b.GROUP_NAME, a.ACTIVE, b.DISPLAYED, b.POTENCY, b.T_DISPOSAL_DATE, b.T_RETEST_DATE, T_USE_START_DATE, b.C_ARRIVAL_DATE, C_DISPATCH_BY, b.C_DISPATCH_DATE, b.C_DISPATCHED_QTY, b.C_DISPATCHED_TO, C_RECEIVED_BY, C_RECEIVED_DATE, b.T_DISPOSAL_DATE, a.STOCK, b.DESCRIPTION, a.T_SUPPLIER, a.C_INV_GRADE, a.T_SUPPLIER_LOT, a.T_NOTE, a.T_MAKER, a.T_SERIAL_NUMBER, T_ARRIVAL_DATE, ENTRY_NAME FROM INVENTORY_ENTRY b INNER JOIN INVENTORY_ITEM a ON a.ITEM_NUMBER = b.ITEM_NUMBER where b.GROUP_NAME = '2007' and a.STOCK like '%column%'

training_data.requirement: kindly provide dump of user MUKESH_22907 has performed analysis on production server from 01/01/23 to 16/03/2024. Previously provided data by you excel attached for reference purpose. Below listed fields are required. User name product code product description/c grade reported name batch number sample number C Grade Reported Name Analysis name Condition Text Id Result AYUSHI_16081 40014599_STB Ketorolac Tromethamine Injection USP 15 mg/1mL (15mg/mL) 7230005 1002532 Ketorolac Tromethamine Injection USP 15 mg/1mL (15mg/mL) DESCRIPTION 40C_75RH 7230005_40014599_STB_S23-F-3-00001_M03_40C_75RH_I-STABILITY Clear, slight yellow solution, free of visible particulate matters, filled in 2mL amber color vial, with gray rubber stopper and sealed with Light green flip-off seal
training_data.sql_query: select distinct r.ENTERED_BY, s.product, s.c_grade_reported_name, s.batch_name, s.sample_number, s.C_Grade_Reported_Name, r.Analysis, s.Condition, s.Text_Id, r.ENTRY from sample s , result r where r.SAMPLE_NUMBER = s.SAMPLE_NUMBER and r.ENTERED_BY = 'MUKESH_22907' and r.ENTERED_ON >= '2023-01-01' and r.ENTERED_ON <= '2024-03-16';

training_data.requirement: Please provide the sump of from 01/01/2024 to 21/03/2024 for Review Open Lots after Lot disposition of 2009 site
training_data.sql_query: select distinct l.LOT_NUMBER, l.LOT_NAME, l.BATCH, REPLACE( REPLACE(l.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '' ) as DESCRIPTION, l.GROUP_NAME, l.PRODUCT, l.PRODUCT_GRADE, l.PRODUCT_VERSION, DATE_CREATED, CHANGED_BY, l.CHANGED_ON, SUPPLIER, EXPIRY_DATE, l.SAMPLING_POINT, l.TEMPLATE, T_PH_UNIT, l.T_SITE, T_PH_LAST_DISP_ON, CLOSED LOT from sample s inner join lot l on s.LOT = l.LOT_NUMBER inner join lot_sampling_point lsp on l.LOT_NUMBER = lsp.LOT_NUMBER and l.closed = 'F' and lsp.DISPOSITION_DATE >= '2024-01-01' and lsp.DISPOSITION_DATE <= '2024-03-21' and lsp.DISPOSITION_BY IS NOT NULL order by l.GROUP_NAME;

training_data.requirement: Please share list of codes from production server in which having below mentioned component : LOD Please find attachment for reference fields. Product Code Description Grade Specification No STP No Analysis Component Spec type LOD
training_data.sql_query: select distinct PRODUCT, Description, s.product_grade, C_SPEC_NUM, C_STP_NUM, Analysis, name as 'component', Spec_type from sample s, result r where s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and r.name like '%LOD%';

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide the work allocation to userkirtan_24899 Duration 12.02.24 to 19.03.24
training_data.sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT T.TEST_NUMBER, S.BATCH_NAME, S.PRODUCT, T.DESCRIPTION AS 'TEST DESC', T.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, T.DATE_RECEIVED, T.DATE_STARTED, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(PS.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'SPECIFICATION' FROM TEST T, SAMPLE S, RESULT R, PRODUCT_SPEC PS WHERE S.SAMPLE_NUMBER = R.SAMPLE_NUMBER AND S.PRODUCT = PS.PRODUCT AND T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER AND T.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR IN ('Kirtan_24899') AND T.DATE_STARTED >= '2024-02-12' AND T.DATE_STARTED <= '2024-03-19';

training_data.requirement: Pls, provide the analyst work allocation for Ms. Drashti Soni (DRASHTI_25549) from date 01/03/2024 to 17/03/2024. Date of analysis Product Name Batch number Balance ID weight Test
training_data.sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT T.TEST_NUMBER, S.BATCH_NAME, S.PRODUCT, T.DESCRIPTION AS 'TEST DESC', R.ENTERED_ON, R.INSTRUMENT, R.ENTRY FROM TEST T, SAMPLE S, RESULT R WHERE S.SAMPLE_NUMBER = R.SAMPLE_NUMBER AND T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER AND T.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR IN ('DRASHTI_25549') AND R.ENTERED_ON >= '2024-03-03' AND R.ENTERED_ON <= '2024-03-17';

training_data.requirement: Template: Lot management: 1. Sample ID 2. Item code/Product 3. Batch No. 4. Lot comment 5. Lot status 6. Remarks 7. Login By 8. Login Date 9. Phase
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.sample_number, p.Name, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(p.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', s.batch_name, l.CLOSED as 'lot status closed', Login_By, Login_Date, LOT_COMMENT, l.C_PHASE from sample s, product p, lot l where s.product = p.name and s.lot = l.LOT_NUMBER and s.GROUP_NAME = '2004' and s.LOGIN_DATE >= '2023-12-01' and s.LOGIN_DATE <= '2024-01-31' and s.TEMPLATE like 'LOT%' order by login_date;

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide dump Please provide Production dump where reported name of component should contain word "Hydrochloric acid". Please make sure that it is current version. Product Code Description Grade Analysis Component Reported name …… Hydrochloric acid ……
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.product, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, r.ANALYSIS, r.name, r.REPORTED_NAME from sample s, result r where s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and name like '%Hydrochloric%acid%' and s.GROUP_NAME = '2001'

training_data.requirement: Kindly share Live instrument of 2009 site.
training_data.sql_query: select distinct i.*

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide Dump of all A1 (API-1) PRODUCT From Validation Server for C_Test_Method Verification / Update
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.product, s.C_SPEC_NUM, ps.C_TEST_METHOD, ps.analysis, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(ps.REPORTED_NAME, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'REPORTED_NAME'

training_data.requirement: Dump required for active LIMS Stability Study dump from 2022 to 2024 of 2004 site , below columns required. 1. Study number 2. Batch number 3. Spec type “stability” or “Micro” 4. Time point I.e. 3,6,9, 12, 18. Shelf life etc
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.TIMEPOINT, s.BATCH_NAME, s.PRODUCT, s.CONDITION, p.STUDY, s.group_name

training_data.requirement: Can today provide Current LIVE Production server Dump as per below column, pl. do the needful as- NAME DESCRIPTION C_SPEC_NUM C_STP_NUM LATEST VERSION GRADE Changed On date C_GENERIC_NAME
training_data.sql_query: select DISTINCT p.NAME, p.VERSION, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(p.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', pg.GRADE, pg.C_GENERIC_NAME, pg.C_STP_NUM, pg.C_SPEC_NUM, p.CHANGED_ON from ( select name, GROUP_NAME, code, max(version) as 'version', DESCRIPTION, CHANGED_ON, ACTIVE from Product group by name, code, DESCRIPTION, GROUP_NAME, CHANGED_ON, ACTIVE ) p, PRODUCT_GRADE pg, PRODUCT_SPEC ps where pg.PRODUCT = p.NAME and ps.PRODUCT = p.NAME and p.ACTIVE = 'T'

training_data.requirement: Kindly arrange dump from Production server with below mentioned details: Instrument ID Description Group Name Inst Group: Site Test Location: Vendor Serial No: Ip Address: Port Number Interfaced
training_data.sql_query: SELECT distinct NAME, DESCRIPTION, GROUP_NAME, INST_GROUP, T_SITE, LOCATION, VENDOR, SERIAL_NO, IP_ADDRESS, PORT_NUMBER, C_INTERFACED FROM instruments;

training_data.requirement: Kindly share 4 series dump from production for site 2009 and 2004 environment.PRODUCT P.DESCRIPTION P.VERSION GROUP_NAME C_SPEC_NUM C_STP_NUM PRODUCT_GRADE
training_data.sql_query: select distinct S.PRODUCT, P.DESCRIPTION, P.VERSION, S.GROUP_NAME, S.C_SPEC_NUM, S.C_STP_NUM, S.PRODUCT_GRADE from sample s, (select name, DESCRIPTION, max(version) as "VERSION", active from Product group by name, DESCRIPTION, active) p WHERE S.PRODUCT = P.NAME and P.ACTIVE = 'T' and S.group_name IN ('2004', '2009') and S.product like '4%'

training_data.requirement: Dear Suraj , Please provide the data as per request" Item code: 30008087_STB Product code: 30008087_US_STB Time: 01/01/2021 to 23/01/2024. SAMPLE_NUMBER ANALYSIS C_SPEC_NUM Text_ID BATCH_NAME PRODUCT STATUS TEMPLATE ENTERED_BY ENTERED_ON SPEC_LIMIT ENTRY
training_data.sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT PS.REPORTED_NAME AS 'TEST_RESULT_NAME', S.BATCH_NAME, S.PRODUCT, PS.DESCRIPTION AS 'SPECIFICATION', R.ENTRY, T.DESCRIPTION AS 'TEST_NAME' FROM SAMPLE S, RESULT R, PRODUCT_SPEC PS, TEST T WHERE R.TEST_NUMBER = T.TEST_NUMBER AND PS.PRODUCT = S.PRODUCT AND S.SAMPLE_NUMBER = R.SAMPLE_NUMBER AND S.PRODUCT = '30008087_US_STB';

training_data.requirement: Please provide the data of chemical inventory from production server as mentioned below. User group: 2006 (F2 site) Inventory: CHEMICAL Sr. No. Stock Description Inventory id Inventory Status (Active/Inactive) Dispatched By Dispatched on Received By Received on Opening Date Expiry Date Comment
training_data.sql_query: select DISTINCT iit.STOCK, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(IE.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', ie.ENTRY_NAME, ie.ACTIVE, it.INVENTORY_ITEM, ie.C_DISPATCH_BY, ie.C_DISPATCH_DATE, ie.C_RECEIVED_BY, ie.C_RECEIVED_DATE, ie.T_USE_START_DATE, ie.EXPIRATION_DATE, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(C_TRANS_REMARK, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'C_TRANS_REMARK', it.TRANSACTION_COMMENT from inventory_trans it, inventory_entry ie, inventory_item iit where it.inventory_item = ie.item_number and ie.item_number = iit.item_number and iit.group_name = '2006' and iit.STOCK like 'CHEMICAL%'

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide below data work allocation data of Neel_23962 & Kirtan_24899 from 10.11.2023 to 12.02.2024 User ID Name of Assigned test Assigned test on date
training_data.sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT T.TEST_NUMBER, S.BATCH_NAME, S.PRODUCT, T.DESCRIPTION AS 'TEST DESC', T.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, T.DATE_RECEIVED, T.DATE_STARTED, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(PS.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'SPECIFICATION' FROM TEST T, SAMPLE S, RESULT R, PRODUCT_SPEC PS WHERE S.SAMPLE_NUMBER = R.SAMPLE_NUMBER AND S.PRODUCT = PS.PRODUCT AND T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER AND T.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR IN ('Neel_23962', 'Kirtan_24899') AND T.DATE_STARTED >= '2023-11-10';

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide the dump from LIMS for the assay test results of test-1 and test-2 as per attached excel sheet for all the batches of code : 30006860 for in process stage
training_data.sql_query: select distinct R.TEST_NUMBER, s.GROUP_NAME, p.NAME as Material_code, p.DESCRIPTiON as Product_name, r.ANALYSIS, s.BATCH_NAME as BATCH, S.SAMPLE_NUMBER, r.NAME as Component_name, REPLACE( REPLACE(r.REPORTED_NAME, CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '' ) as REPORTED_NAME, Replace( Replace(Replace(r.entry, Char(9), ''), CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'Entered_value' from sample s inner join PRODUCT_SPEC ps on ps.PRODUCT = s.PRODUCT inner join result r on s.sample_number = r.sample_number inner join product p on p.name = s.product, TEST T WHERE T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER and p.name LIKE '%30006860%INP%' and (r.analysis like '%Assay%') AND ( R.NAME LIKE ('R%[_]%1') OR R.NAME LIKE ('R%[_]%2') ) ORDER BY R.TEST_NUMBER

training_data.requirement: Please provide the data of standard inventory from production server as mentioned below. User group: 2006 (F2 site) Inventory: PRS, PS, WS, IMP, RS Sr.No. Stock Description Inventory number Inventory Type Supplier Batch No Manufacturer Exp date
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.NAME, REPLACE( REPLACE(s.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '' ) as DESCRIPTION, ie.ITEM_NUMBER, s.INVENTORY_TYPE, iit.T_SUPPLIER, iit.T_SUPPLIER_LOT as 'BATCH', ie.EXPIRATION_DATE, IE.ENTRY_NAME, POTENCY, ITEM_NAME, iit.GROUP_NAME, T_USE_START_DATE, IE.T_RETEST_DATE, IIT.ACTIVE from inventory_entry ie, inventory_item iit, stock s where iit.stock = s.name and ie.item_number = iit.item_number and ( ITEM_NAME like 'PRS%' or ITEM_NAME like 'PS%' or ITEM_NAME like 'WS%' or ITEM_NAME like 'IMP%' or ITEM_NAME like 'RS%' ) --AND s.INVENTORY_TYPE like '%STD%' and iit.group_name = '2006' AND ( ie.EXPIRATION_DATE >= '2024-02-15' or ie.EXPIRATION_DATE IS NULL ) and (T_DISPOSAL_DATE IS NULL) and ie.ACTIVE = 'T' order by s.name;

training_data.requirement: Provide dump of the product as mention in tabulated form below Product code Analysis Components C spec reported name 40016534 40016535 40016235 40016230 30005934 40016231
training_data.sql_query: select distinct ps.PRODUCT, ps.ANALYSIS, ps.COMPONENT, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(ps.REPORTED_NAME, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'REPORTED_NAME' from product_spec ps where ps.product in ( '40016534', '40016535', '40016230', '30005934', '40016231' ) r.ENTERED_BY, r.ENTERED_ON, r.PRODUCT, r.BATCH_NAME, r.ANALYSIS, r.NAME, r.ENTRY, r.ENTERED_ON

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide in-process result data for below mention material code from 19/06/2023 to 10/02/2024 on very priority basis as per attached excel. Material code: 1. 30002245 2. 30006547 3. 30000259 4. 30009835
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.product, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, s.group_name, s.BATCH_NAME, s.DESCRIPTION, s.STAGE, s.C_SPEC_NUM, s.CUSTOMER, s.C_INP_LIMIT, s.LOGIN_DATE, s.RECD_DATE, s.DATE_STARTED, s.DATE_COMPLETED, s.DATE_REVIEWED, s.CHANGED_ON, s.DATE_REVIEWED, s.TEMPLATE, r.IMPORTANT_MESSAGE, r.entry from sample s, result r where s.sample_number = r.sample_number and s.group_name = '2003' and ( s.product like '30002245%' or s.product like '30006547%' or s.product like '30000259%' or s.product like '30009835%' ) and r.ENTERED_ON >= '2023-06-19' and r.ENTERED_ON <= '2024-02-10'; p.NAME, p.DESCRIPTION, p.VERSION, p.GRADE, p.C_GENERIC_NAME, p.C_STP_NUM, p.C_SPEC_NUM

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide dump as per Below dump of User MANSI_25492 from 11/11/23 to till date of 2004 site. Sample Number C Grade Reported Name Text Id Batch Name Timepoint Specification Number Assigned Operator Analysis Date Started 1348661 Doxepin Hydrochloride Capsules, USP 10 mg 2205002500_40014562_US_STB_S22-F1-01847_SHELF_LIFE_TP_25C_60RH_N-STABILITY 2205002500 SHELF_LIFE_TP CSPCFPS\00266-2.0 MANSI_25492 DISSO_PARAMETER_1 13/02/2024 12:15
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.sample_number, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(s.C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME', s.TEXT_ID, s.BATCH_NAME, s.TIMEPOINT, s.C_SPEC_NUM, r.ENTERED_BY, r.ANALYSIS, s.DATE_STARTED from sample s, result r where s.sample_number = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and r.entered_by = 'MANSI_25492' and r.entered_on >= '2023-11-11';

training_data.requirement: kindly provide dump of user MUKESH_22907 has performed analysis on production server from 01/01/23 to 16/03/2024. Previously provided data by you excel attached for reference purpose. Below listed fields are required. User name product code product description/c grade reported name batch number sample number C Grade Reported Name Analysis name Condition Text Id Result AYUSHI_16081 40014599_STB Ketorolac Tromethamine Injection USP 15 mg/1mL (15mg/mL) 7230005 1002532 Ketorolac Tromethamine Injection USP 15 mg/1mL (15mg/mL) DESCRIPTION 40C_75RH 7230005_40014599_STB_S23-F-3-00001_M03_40C_75RH_I-STABILITY Clear, slight yellow solution, free of visible particulate matters, filled in 2mL amber color vial, with gray rubber stopper and sealed with Light green flip-off seal
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.ENTERED_BY, s.LOT, s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.TEXT_ID, s.GROUP_NAME, s.PRODUCT, s.DESCRIPTION, s.BATCH_NAME, s.TEMPLATE, s.TEST_NUMBER, s.RESULT_NUMBER, s.ORDER_NUMBER, s.ANALYSIS, s.NAME, s.Reported_name, s.REPLICATE_COUNT, s.Modified_result, s.MINIMUM, s.MAXIMUM, s.ENTRY, s.Formatted_entry, s.NUMERIC_ENTRY, s.FIRST_ENTRY, s.UNITS, s.ROUND, s.PLACES, s.IN_SPEC, s.PRIMARY_IN_SPEC, s.ENTERED_ON, s.FIRST_ENTRY_BY, s.FIRST_ENTRY_ON, s.DATE_REVIEWED, s.REVIEWER, s.CHANGED_ON, s.Important_Message from sample s, result r where s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and s.LOGIN_DATE >= '2023-01-01' and s.LOGIN_DATE >= '2024-03-16' and r.ENTERED_BY = 'MUKESH_22907'

training_data.requirement: Provide production server dump of chemical detail as per below table for 2006 site from Date 30/07/21 to 12/12/23 Product Description product code Analysis/Test sample No. Batch No. chemical Name make Grade Chemical Batch No./ Lims Lot no. Fluorouracil injection USP 2.5 g/ 50 mL (50 mg/mL) 30008419 Assay Fluorouracil injection USP 5 g/ 100 mL(50 mg/mL) 30008420 Assay
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.product, p.VERSION as 'MAX VERSION', REPLACE( REPLACE(p.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '' ) as DESCRIPTION, s.BATCH_NAME, s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.STAGE, r.ANALYSIS, r.name, r.ENTERED_BY, r.ENTERED_ON, R.ENTRY, T_SHOW_ON_CERTIFICATE --if true then any result from sample s, result r, ( select name, DESCRIPTION, max(version) as 'VERSION', active from Product group by name, DESCRIPTION, active ) p where s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and p.name = s.product and s.SPEC_TYPE = 'MICRO' and s.PRODUCT in ('30000037', '30007755');

training_data.requirement: kindly provide the data from test table for assigned user as below Sr No. Assigned user Product Analysis name Test Name STP number Specification Number Assigned on Completed on Nirmit_25096 Nikita_25023 Amisha_24220 Surveer_24218 Nilesh_24265
training_data.sql_query: select distinct t.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, s.Product, t.ANALYSIS, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(a.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'ANALYSIS_DESCRIPTION', REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(t.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'TEST', s.C_STP_NUM, s.C_SPEC_NUM, s.DATE_STARTED, t.DATE_COMPLETED from sample s, test t, ANALYSIS a where a.NAME = t.ANALYSIS and s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = t.SAMPLE_NUMBER and t.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR in ( 'Nirmit_25096', 'Nikita_25023', 'Amisha_24220', 'Surveer_24218', 'Nilesh_24265' );

training_data.requirement: Kindly share information that how many digits or Character available in Object ID field of below mentioned stability studies. For field detail, SS is shared. Stability Study in 2004 group. S23-F1-01045 S23-F1-00492 S23-F1-00051 S23-F1-00054 S23-F1-00047 S23-F1-00048 S23-F1-00060
training_data.sql_query: select * from TIME_ZERO where PROTOCOL like ( 'S23-F1-01045', 'S23-F1-00492', 'S23-F1-00051', 'S23-F1-00054', 'S23-F1-00047', 'S23-F1-00048', 'S23-F1-00060' ) select * from TIME_ZERO where PROTOCOL like ('S23-F1-01045%') OR PROTOCOL like ('S23-F1-00492%') OR PROTOCOL like ('S23-F1-00051%') OR PROTOCOL like ('S23-F1-00054%') OR PROTOCOL like ('S23-F1-00047%') OR PROTOCOL like ('S23-F1-00048%') OR PROTOCOL like ('S23-F1-00060%')

training_data.requirement: Please share data of product from production environment. Word used as “Filter” or “Filtered” in Reported name. Find attached SS. Group- 2006 Sr.No. PRODUCT ANALYSIS DESCRIPTION REPORTED NAME COMPONENT
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.PRODUCT, a.NAME as 'ANALYSIS', REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(a.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', r.REPORTED_NAME, r.NAME as 'COMPOENNT' from analysis a, ( select * from result where REPORTED_NAME like '%Filter%' ) r, ( select * from sample where GROUP_NAME = '2006' ) s, product p where a.NAME = r.ANALYSIS and r.SAMPLE_NUMBER = s.SAMPLE_NUMBER;

training_data.requirement: Please provide the data as per request. RM , FP , Intermediate , Packing Material ,Recovered solvent . This is on High priority for audit purpose . Product code Product Description Lot No. I.L.No. Sample No. Lot Creation date Disposition (A & R) Disposition by Disposition date Plant-2001
training_data.sql_query: select DISTINCT p.NAME, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(p.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.LOT, s.TEXT_ID as IL_No, s.BATCH_NAME, l.DISPOSITION, l.DISPOSITION_DATE, l.DISPOSITION_BY, lt.DATE_CREATED from lot lt, sample s, PRODUCT p, LOT_SAMPLING_POINT l where s.lot = lt.LOT_NUMBER and p.NAME = s.PRODUCT and s.lot = l.LOT_NUMBER and s.STATUS IN ('A', 'R') and s.C_ITEM_SPEC_CLASS = 'REC' and l.DISPOSITION_DATE > = '2023-01-01' and s.GROUP_NAME = '2001';

training_data.requirement: Kindly share product dump for below analysis of 2001 PSD_RESULT PSD_RESULT_1 PSD_RESULT_2 PSD_RESULT_3 PRODUCT VERSION SAMPLING_POINT GRADE STAGE ANALYSIS COMPONENT UNITS ROUND PLACES ORDER_NUMBER SPEC_RULE MIN_VALUE MAX_VALUE TEXT_VALUE SPEC_TYPE REPORTED_NAME DESCRIPTION T_SHOW_ON_CERTIFICATE IMPORTANT_MESSAGE C_INV_QUAL_COMP C_STOCK C_STD_TYPE_COMP C_BOLD C_DEFAULT_RESULT C_SPEC_REPORTED_NAME NAME VERSION CODE DESCRIPTION COST_FACTOR CHANGED_ON CHANGED_BY REMOVED GROUP_NAME TEMPLATE GRADE_TEMPLATE STAGE_TEMPLATE NUMERIC_SPEC_TEMP TEXT_SPEC_TEMP FORMULA_SPEC_TEMP SPC_SPEC_TEMP REPORTED_SPEC_TEMP
training_data.sql_query: select distinct ps.PRODUCT, ps.ANALYSIS, ps.SPEC_RULE, ps.MIN_VALUE, ps.MAX_VALUE, ps.TEXT_VALUE, ps.SPEC_TYPE, ps.REPORTED_NAME, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(ps.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as DESCRIPTION, ps.T_SHOW_ON_CERTIFICATE, ps.IMPORTANT_MESSAGE, ps.C_STD_TYPE_COMP, p.NAME, p.VERSION, p.CODE, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(p.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, p.CHANGED_ON, p.GROUP_NAME, p.GRADE_TEMPLATE, p.STAGE_TEMPLATE, p.NUMERIC_SPEC_TEMP, p.TEXT_SPEC_TEMP, p.FORMULA_SPEC_TEMP, p.SPC_SPEC_TEMP, p.REPORTED_SPEC_TEMP from product p, ( select PRODUCT, max(VERSION) VERSION, SAMPLING_POINT, GRADE, STAGE, ANALYSIS, UNITS, ROUND, PLACES, ORDER_NUMBER, SPEC_RULE, MIN_VALUE, MAX_VALUE, TEXT_VALUE, SPEC_TYPE, REPORTED_NAME, DESCRIPTION, T_SHOW_ON_CERTIFICATE, IMPORTANT_MESSAGE, C_INV_QUAL_COMP, C_STOCK, C_STD_TYPE_COMP, C_BOLD, C_DEFAULT_RESULT, C_SPEC_REPORTED_NAME from PRODUCT_SPEC group by PRODUCT, VERSION, SAMPLING_POINT, GRADE, STAGE, ANALYSIS, UNITS, ROUND, PLACES, ORDER_NUMBER, SPEC_RULE, MIN_VALUE, MAX_VALUE, TEXT_VALUE, SPEC_TYPE, REPORTED_NAME, DESCRIPTION, T_SHOW_ON_CERTIFICATE, IMPORTANT_MESSAGE, C_INV_QUAL_COMP, C_STOCK, C_STD_TYPE_COMP, C_BOLD, C_DEFAULT_RESULT, C_SPEC_REPORTED_NAME ) ps where p.group_name = '2001' and analysis in ( 'PSD_RESULT', 'PSD_RESULT_1', 'PSD_RESULT_2', 'PSD_RESULT_3' ) and p.CHANGED_ON >= '2022-12-01';

training_data.requirement: Please provide the data as requested Purpose: To verify C Test Method Server: Production server Site: API-I (can be filtered through spec no. A1\SPC\..) Product: INT, RSS,RM,API (All products) NAME DESCRIPTION C_SPEC_NUM C_TEST_METHOD ANALYSIS REPORTED_NAME
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.product, s.C_SPEC_NUM, ps.C_TEST_METHOD, ps.analysis, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(ps.REPORTED_NAME, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'REPORTED_NAME' from sample s, PROD_GRADE_STAGE ps where s.product = ps.product and s.GROUP_NAME = '2001' and s.C_SPEC_NUM != 'specno';

training_data.requirement: Analyst Name: Mr. Mukesh Pathak (17724) Test: Assay by HPLC Time: 14/10/2023 to 14/11/2023. Analyst Name: Mr. Siddharth Gokhle (18688) Test: Assay by HPLC Time: 17/11/2023 to 17/02/2024. SAMPLE_NUMBER ANALYSIS Date of Analysis Specification Limit C_SPEC_NUM Text_ID BATCH_NAME PRODUCT STATUS TEMPLATE ENTRY
training_data.sql_query: select distinct r.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.GROUP_NAME, r.ANALYSIS, r.ENTERED_ON, s.TEXT_ID, s.BATCH_NAME, s.C_SPEC_NUM, s.STATUS as 'sample status', r.STATUS as 'result status', s.PRODUCT, TEMPLATE, r.ENTRY, REPLACE( REPLACE(TEXT_LIMIT, CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'SPEC LIMIT', entered_by from result r, sample s where s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and r.ANALYSIS like '%ASSAY%HPLC%' and ENTERED_BY like '%18688' and ENTERED_ON >= '2023-11-17' and ENTERED_ON <= '2024-02-17';

training_data.requirement: Required “HPLC analysis” Like performed on instrument QC/EQP/668 for last 1 month. Date :- from 01.01.24 to till date. Required field; Ø Result , Acceptance Criteria ,Batch number , STP number ,Lot Number
training_data.sql_query: select distinct r.ENTERED_BY, s.LOT, r.SAMPLE_NUMBER, l.LOT_NAME, s.PRODUCT, l.T_PH_ITEM_CODE, s.DESCRIPTION, s.BATCH_NAME, s.TEMPLATE, r.SAMPLE_NUMBER, r.TEST_NUMBER, r.RESULT_NUMBER, r.ORDER_NUMBER, r.ANALYSIS, r.NAME, r.REPORTED_NAME, r.REPLICATE_COUNT, r.RESULT_TYPE, r.STATUS, r.OLD_STATUS, r.MODIFIED_RESULT, r.MINIMUM, r.MAXIMUM, r.ALLOW_OUT, r.ENTRY, r.FORMATTED_ENTRY, r.NUMERIC_ENTRY, r.FIRST_ENTRY, r.UNITS, r.ROUND, r.PLACES, r.IN_SPEC, r.PRIMARY_IN_SPEC, r.ENTERED_ON, r.ENTERED_BY, r.FIRST_ENTRY_ON, r.FIRST_ENTRY_BY, r.DATE_REVIEWED, r.REVIEWER, r.INSTRUMENT, r.USES_INSTRUMENT, r.USES_CODES, r.IN_CAL, r.AUTO_CALC, r.LIST_KEY, r.ALLOW_CANCEL, r.LINK_SIZE, r.LINK_DATE, r.REPORTABLE, r.OPTIONAL, r.CODE_ENTERED, r.CHANGED_ON, r.STD_REAG_SAMPLE, r.HAS_ATTRIBUTES, r.FACTOR_VALUE, r.FACTOR_OPERATOR, r.ENTRY_TYPE, r.MIN_LIMIT, r.MAX_LIMIT, r.ALIAS_NAME, r.CONTROL_1, r.CONTROL_2, r.IN_CONTROL, r.DISPLAYED, r.ENTRY_QUALIFIER, r.SPEC_OVERRIDE, r.DOUBLE_ENTRY_CHK, r.LO_CONTROL, r.HI_CONTROL, r.TEXT_LIMIT, r.BATCH, r.FORMAT_CALCULATION, r.DATE_ENTRY, r.MILL_RES_NUM, r.DB_FILE, r.CHART_COMMENT, r.T_PH_AQL_REPS, r.T_PH_AQL_TYPE, r.ATTRIBUTE_1, r.ATTRIBUTE_10, r.ATTRIBUTE_11, r.ATTRIBUTE_12, r.ATTRIBUTE_13, r.ATTRIBUTE_14, r.ATTRIBUTE_15, r.ATTRIBUTE_16, r.ATTRIBUTE_17, r.ATTRIBUTE_18, r.ATTRIBUTE_19, r.ATTRIBUTE_2, r.ATTRIBUTE_20, r.ATTRIBUTE_3, r.ATTRIBUTE_4, r.ATTRIBUTE_5, r.ATTRIBUTE_6, r.ATTRIBUTE_7, r.ATTRIBUTE_8, r.ATTRIBUTE_9, r.T_PH_PROD_COMPOUND, r.SAP_CONFIRMATION_NO, r.SAP_DEFECT, r.SAP_EVAL_TYPE, r.SAP_RECORDING_TYPE, r.SAP_REPLICATES, r.SAPPED, r.SAP_OPTIONAL, r.ES_REPORTED_NAME, r.T_DISS_TIMEPOINT, r.C_ORDER_NUMBER, r.C_SOURCE_RES_NUM, r.IMPORTANT_MESSAGE, r.T_STOCK, r.C_INV_ITEM_ENTRY, r.C_INV_QUAL_COMP, r.C_STD_CONSUMED, r.C_STOCK, r.C_STD_TYPE_COMP, r.C_BOLD, r.C_DEFAULT_RESULT, r.C_DRGD_LIMIT, r.C_LOD_LIMIT, r.C_LOQ_LIMIT, r.C_RPT_LIMIT, r.C_RPT_THRESHOLD, r.C_INST_RESULT, r.C_INST_FILE_PATH, r.C_RS232_RESULT, r.T_SHOW_ON_CERTIFICATE, r.FROM_INSTRUMENT, r.I_PARAMETER_1, r.I_PARAMETER_2, r.I_PARAMETER_3, r.I_PARAMETER_4, r.C_AQ_ACCEPT_LIMIT from sample s, result r, lot l where s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and s.lot = l.LOT_NUMBER and r.ANALYSIS like '%HPLC%' and INSTRUMENT like '%QC%EQP%668%' and r.ENTERED_ON >= '2023-07-27'

training_data.requirement: Please provide the data on high priority . API-1 QC calibration data for yearly OOC trend preparation for the period of 01/01/2022 to 31/12/2023. INSTRUMENT NAME INSTRUMENT ID CALIBRATION TYPE SAMPLE NUMBER CALIBRATION FREQUNCY CALIBRATION STATUS CALIBRATION LOGIN DATE CALIBRATION LOGON BY CALIBRATION RESULT ENTER DATE CALIBRATION RESULT ENTERED BY CALIBRATION RESULT REVIEWED BY TEST LOCATION
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.T_PH_INSTRUMENT, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(i.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as '_NAME', s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, s.STATUS, s.LOGIN_DATE, s.LOGIN_BY, r.ENTERED_ON, r.ENTERED_BY, r.REVIEWER, s.T_SITE, r.ENTRY from sample s, result r, INSTRUMENTS i where r.SAMPLE_NUMBER = s.SAMPLE_NUMBER AND r.ANALYSIS = 'CALIBRATION' AND i.NAME = s.T_PH_INSTRUMENT AND s.GROUP_NAME = '2001' order by ENTERED_ON;

training_data.requirement: Kindly share C Test method live list available on Production environment.
training_data.sql_query: select distinct p.NAME, pgs.C_TEST_METHOD, pgs.ANALYSIS, p.ACTIVE from PROD_GRADE_STAGE pgs, PRODUCT_GRADE pg, PRODUCT p where p.NAME = pgs.PRODUCT and p.NAME = pg.PRODUCT and pgs.C_TEST_METHOD IS NOT NULL and p.ACTIVE = 'T';

training_data.requirement: Please provide the inprocess results data 30006541_INP 30006542_INP 30006546_INP Date range : Data required for 01-Jan-23 to 31-Dec-23
training_data.sql_query: select DISTINCT t.SAMPLE_NUMBER, t.ANALYSIS, s.TEXT_ID, s.C_INP_MFG_BLOCK, s.BATCH_NAME, s.PRODUCT, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, s.PRODUCT_VERSION, s.DESCRIPTION, s.STATUS, s.LOGIN_DATE, s.RECD_DATE, s.DATE_COMPLETED, s.DATE_REVIEWED, s.TEMPLATE, s.IMPORTANT_MESSAGE, s.STEP, t.ENTRY, t.FORMATTED_ENTRY, t.ENTERED_ON from SAMPLE s, T_PH_COA t_ph, ( select distinct name, max(version) version, description from product group by name, DESCRIPTION ) p, RESULT t where s.product = p.NAME and s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = t.SAMPLE_NUMBER and s.LOT = t_ph.LOT_NUMBER and s.PRODUCT IN ('30006541_INP', '30006542_INP', '30006546_INP') and s.LOGIN_DATE >= '2023-01-01' and s.LOGIN_DATE <= '2023-12-31' AND T_SHOW_ON_CERTIFICATE = 'T'

training_data.requirement: We required only Reference standard live list (in used / Stock) of 2004 site.
training_data.sql_query: select ie.EXPIRATION_DATE, ie.T_DISPOSAL_DATE, ie.ITEM_NUMBER, ie.GROUP_NAME, ie.TEMPLATE, ie.INVENTORY_TYPE, ii.STOCK, ie.ENTRY_NAME, ii.T_SUPPLIER, ii.T_SUPPLIER_LOT, ii.T_ARRIVAL_DATE, ii.T_NUM_CONTAINER, ie.QUANTITY, ie.UNITS, ii.T_CONTAINER, ie.QUANTITY, ie.UNITS, ii.T_MAKER, ii.T_PROD_DATE, ii.C_MANU_EXP_DT, ii.T_EXPIRATION_DATE, ii.T_NOTE, ii.C_INV_GRADE, ie.C_DISPATCH_BY, ie.C_DISPATCHED_QTY, ie.C_DISPATCHED_TO, ie.C_DISPATCH_DATE, ie.C_DISPATCHED_YN, ie.C_INV_ACTIVE, ie.T_USE_START_DATE, ie.C_RECEIVED_BY, ie.C_RECEIVED_DATE, ie.C_SOURCE_INV_ENT, ie.T_DISPOSAL_DATE, ie.T_RETEST_DATE, ie.C_TRANS_REMARK, ie.C_PRINT_LABEL1, ie.C_PRINT_LABEL2, C_Created_By from INVENTORY_ITEM ii inner join INVENTORY_ENTRY ie on ii.ITEM_NUMBER = ie.ITEM_NUMBER where ie.GROUP_NAME in ('2004') and ie.T_DISPOSAL_DATE is null AND ii.STOCK LIKE '%RS_%';;

training_data.requirement: Please share list of PRD and Training samples of All group details where Analysis: BB_ORGANISM_USED_1 is used. Sample ID Text ID Analysis Template Login Date Login By BB_ORGANISM_USED_1 BB_ORGANISM_USED_1
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.TEXT_ID, r.ANALYSIS, s.TEMPLATE, s.LOGIN_BY, s.LOGIN_DATE from sample s, Result r, ANALYSIS a where r.SAMPLE_NUMBER = s.SAMPLE_NUMBER and r.ANALYSIS = a.NAME and a.DESCRIPTION like '%ORGANISM%USED%' and s.TEXT_ID like 'BB%';

training_data.requirement: Please provide the details of usage of standard from production environment. Group- 2006 1) RE31/F2/24/001-Iodine solution Lot Sample number Group Product Analysis component Entry Formatted entry Entered by Entered on
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.lot, s.Sample_number, s.Group_name, Product, Analysis, r.name, Entry, Formatted_entry, Entered_by, Entered_on from sample s, result r where r.SAMPLE_NUMBER = s.SAMPLE_NUMBER and GROUP_NAME = '2006' and r.entry like ('RE31/F2/24/001%')

training_data.requirement: Kindly share information that how many digits or Character available in Object ID field of below mentioned stability studies, Excel attached for reference. S23-F1-01048 S23-F1-01044 For field detail, SS is shared.

training_data.requirement: Kindly share data of user SIDDHARAJ_22551 from 1st January 2023 to Till date. Sample number Instrument ID Product Grade C Grade Reported Name Inst Event Inst. Event Type Date Started Date Reviewed Date Completed QUARTERLY
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, r.INSTRUMENT, s.PRODUCT, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, s.C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME, s.T_PH_INST_EVENT, s.T_INST_EVENT_TYPE, s.DATE_STARTED, s.DATE_REVIEWED, s.DATE_COMPLETED from sample s,result r where r.SAMPLE_NUMBER = s.SAMPLE_NUMBER AND r.ENTERED_BY = 'SIDDHARAJ_22551' and s.LOGIN_DATE >= '2023-01-01';

training_data.requirement: with latest product version, Kindly share data of below analyst. Previous data shared, kindly add specification limit (Important message) in dump and share again. MAHAMAD_19061 HITESHVARI_15468 Duration: Initial to till date both of analyst ENTERED_ON PRODUCT MATERIAL NAME SPEC NO. STP NO. TEXT_ID ANALYSIS ENTRY SPECIFICATION LIMIT
training_data.sql_query: select distinct r.ENTERED_BY, s.PRODUCT, p.DESCRIPTION as 'PRODUCT_NAME', s.C_SPEC_NUM, s.C_STP_NUM, s.TEXT_ID, r.ANALYSIS, r.ENTRY, r.TEXT_LIMIT as 'SPEC LIMIT', r.ENTERED_ON, r.NAME from sample s, result r, product p where s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and s.product = p.name and r.ENTERED_BY in ('MAHAMAD_19061', 'HITESHVARI_15468');

training_data.requirement: Kindly share dump of Open lot after lot disposition dump of 2004 from 1st January, 2024 to till date.| LOT_NUMBER LOT_NAME BATCH DESCRIPTION GROUP_NAME PRODUCT PRODUCT_GRADE PRODUCT_VERSION p CHANGED_BY CHANGED_ON SUPPLIER EXPIRY_DATE SAMPLING_POINT TEMPLATE T_PH_UNIT T_SITE T_PH_LAST_DISP_ON LOT
training_data.sql_query: select distinct lt.LOT_NUMBER, lt.LOT_NAME, lt.BATCH, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(lt.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', lt.GROUP_NAME, lt.PRODUCT, lt.PRODUCT_GRADE, lt.PRODUCT_VERSION, lt.CHANGED_BY, lt.CHANGED_ON, lt.SUPPLIER, lt.EXPIRY_DATE, lt.SAMPLING_POINT, lt.TEMPLATE, lt.T_PH_UNIT, lt.T_SITE, lt.T_PH_LAST_DISP_ON from LOT lt where lt.GROUP_NAME = '2004' and lt.T_PH_LAST_DISP_ON >= '2024-01-01';

training_data.requirement: Please share the all types of cancelled sample in LIMS from 01/01/2019 to 31/12/2023 with user id who Is cancelled as per below details.[Product Code Product Description Lot No. Sample No. Batch No. Sample Status (X) Cancelled by plant wise Login Date Cancelled By (Reviewed)]
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.GROUP_NAME, STATUS, DBO.SANITIZE_TEXT(s.C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME) as 'C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME', BATCH_NAME, s.PRODUCT, LOT NUMBER, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, DBO.SANITIZE_TEXT(s.DESCRIPTION) as 'DESCRIPTION', STAGE, LOGIN_DATE, DATE_COMPLETED, DBO.SANITIZE_TEXT(REASON) as 'CANCELLATION REMARK', SA.USER_NAME AS '_CANCELLED_BY' from lot l right join sample s on s.LOT = l.LOT_NUMBER, SAMPLE_AUDIT_LOG sa where s.status = 'X' and s.GROUP_NAME = '2003' and s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = sa.SAMPLE_NUMBER and sa.AUDIT_TYPE = 'CancelSample' and sa.TABLE_NAME = 'SAMPLE' AND SA.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP >= '2023-12-01' AND SA.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP <= '2023-12-31' ORDER BY S.PRODUCT DESC;

training_data.requirement: Kindly share the List of cancelled sample as per below table. [Site code 2003 SAMPLE_NUMBER GROUP_NAME TEXT_ID STATUS C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME C_INP_MFG_BLOCK BATCH_NAME STEP PRODUCT PRODUCT_GRADE DESCRIPTION STAGE C_SPEC_NUM CUSTOMER C_INP_LIMIT LOGIN_DATE RECD_DATE DATE_STARTED DATE_COMPLETED DATE_REVIEWED CHANGED_ON DATE_REVIEWED TEMPLATE IMPORTANT_MESSAGE]
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.GROUP_NAME, STATUS, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(s.C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME, ',', ';'), CHAR(13), ' ' ), CHAR(10), ' ' ), CHAR(9), ' ' ) as 'C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME', BATCH_NAME, s.PRODUCT, LOT NUMBER, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(REPLACE(s.DESCRIPTION, ',', ';'), CHAR(13), ' '), CHAR(10), ' ' ), CHAR(9), ' ' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', STAGE, LOGIN_DATE, DATE_COMPLETED, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(REPLACE(REASON, ',', ';'), CHAR(13), ' '), CHAR(10), ' ' ), CHAR(9), ' ' ) as 'CANCELLATION REMARK' from lot l right join sample s on s.LOT = l.LOT_NUMBER, SAMPLE_AUDIT_LOG sa where s.status = 'X' and s.GROUP_NAME = '2003' and s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = sa.SAMPLE_NUMBER and sa.AUDIT_TYPE = 'CancelSample' and sa.TABLE_NAME = 'SAMPLE'

training_data.requirement: Please provide the product dump(Product-code_EC (Equipment cleaning product) available on PRD server For all Alembic sites available in LIMS production server. Attachment for reference. [PRODUCT Description PRODUCT_VERSION C_SPEC_NUM 30000212_EC Leflunomide (Stage-IV) 1 A1\STP\CLP\00255-1.0]
training_data.sql_query: select DISTINCT p.NAME, p.version, p.CODE, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(p.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', pg.GRADE, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(pg.C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'C_GRADE_REPORTED_NAME', REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(pg.C_SPEC_NUM, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'C_SPEC_NUM', pg.C_STP_NUMs from product p, PRODUCT_GRADE pg, PRODUCT_SPEC ps where pg.PRODUCT = p.NAME and ps.PRODUCT = p.NAME and ( C_SPEC_NUM like 'A2%' or C_STP_NUM like 'A2%' ) and p.NAME like '%_EC' order by p.NAME, p.VERSION;

training_data.requirement: Kindly provide provide production server dump for 2006 site as per below requirement We need details of analysis performed in LIMS for below mentioned material code for DRF investigation purpose Name of product /Material Material code Test Name Purified water 10005580 pH and Conductivity (at 25°C) Water for injection 10002479 Pure steam (Condensate) 10002480 Potable water 10002484 Source water 10002524 Conductivity (at 25°C) Details required in below mentioned format Sr. No. Name of product /Material Material code B.No. A.R.No. Test Name - pH Test Name - Conductivity (at 25°C) LIMS component name LIMS component name RESULT_1 [pH value] [pH Result] OBS_2 [Observation] OBS_1 [Conductivity (at 25°C) Result]
training_data.sql_query: select distinct r.entered_by, r.TEST_NUMBER, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(t.DESCRIPTION, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'DESCRIPTION', s.PRODUCT, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(s.TEXT_ID, CHAR(9), ''), CHAR(13), '' ), CHAR(10), '' ) as 'ILNo_ARNo', s.BATCH_NAME, r.ENTERED_ON, s.GROUP_NAME, t_ph.SUPPLIER, t_ph.C_MANUFACTURER, t_ph.C_BATCH, t_ph.C_LOT_REMARK, t_ph.LOT_NAME from sample s, result r, test t, T_PH_COA t_ph where s.LOT = t_ph.LOT_NUMBER and t.TEST_NUMBER = r.TEST_NUMBER and s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = r.SAMPLE_NUMBER and ( r.NAME like 'RESULT_%Assay%' or r.NAME like 'OBS_1' or r.NAME like 'OBS_2' )

training_data.requirement: Please send Retain stock data as per below table. [ITEM_NUMBER CHANGED_BY CHANGED_ON GROUP_NAME QUANTITY UNITS ITEM_NAME T_PH_ITEM_CODE T_PH_LOT_NAME FULL_CHANGED_BY Entry Name Item Entry LOT Number]
training_data.sql_query: select DISTINCT ii.ITEM_NUMBER, l.CHANGED_BY, l.CHANGED_ON, l.GROUP_NAME, l.QUANTITY, ii.UNITS, ii.ITEM_NAME, l.T_PH_ITEM_CODE, l.T_PH_LOT_NAME, ii.FULL_CHANGED_BY, IE.Entry_Name, IE.Item_Entry, l.LOT_Number from lot l, INVENTORY_ITEM ii, INVENTORY_ENTRY IE WHERE IE.LOT_NUMBER = L.LOT_NUMBER AND II.ITEM_NUMBER = IE.ITEM_NUMBER AND STOCK = 'RETAINED';

training_data.requirement: Please provide the Inprocess data for below material code from 01/01/2020 to till date. 30009877_INP
training_data.sql_query: select s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, t.ANALYSIS, s.TEXT_ID, s.C_INP_MFG_BLOCK, s.BATCH_NAME, s.PRODUCT, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, s.PRODUCT_VERSION, p.DESCRIPTION, s.STATUS, s.LOGIN_DATE, s.RECD_DATE, s.DATE_COMPLETED, s.DATE_REVIEWED, s.TEMPLATE, s.IMPORTANT_MESSAGE, s.STEP, t.ENTRY, t.FORMATTED_ENTRY from SAMPLE s, ( select distinct name, max(version) version, description from product group by name, DESCRIPTION ) p, ( select distinct ANALYSIS, SAMPLE_NUMBER, ENTRY, FORMATTED_ENTRY from RESULT ) t where s.product = p.NAME and s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = t.SAMPLE_NUMBER and s.group_name = '2001' and s.TEMPLATE = 'INPROCESS_SAMPLE_API' and p.NAME like '30000101_inp%'

training_data.requirement: Please provide the Inprocess data for below material code from 01/01/2020 to till date. 30009877_INP
training_data.sql_query: select s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, t.ANALYSIS, s.TEXT_ID, s.C_INP_MFG_BLOCK, s.BATCH_NAME, s.PRODUCT, s.PRODUCT_GRADE, s.PRODUCT_VERSION, p.DESCRIPTION, s.STATUS, s.LOGIN_DATE, s.RECD_DATE, s.DATE_COMPLETED, s.DATE_REVIEWED, s.TEMPLATE, s.IMPORTANT_MESSAGE, t.ENTERED_BY, s.DATE_COMPLETED, s.REVIEWER from SAMPLE s, ( select distinct name, max(version) version, description from product group by name, DESCRIPTION ) p, ( select distinct ANALYSIS, SAMPLE_NUMBER, ENTERED_BY from RESULT ) t where s.product = p.NAME and s.SAMPLE_NUMBER = t.SAMPLE_NUMBER and s.group_name = '2001' and s.PRODUCT = '30009877_INP' and s.LOGIN_DATE >= '2020-01-01'

training_data.requirement: We required only Reference standard live list (in used / Stock) of 2004 site.
training_data.sql_query: SELECT DISTINCT ii.STOCK, ie.EXPIRATION_DATE, ie.T_DISPOSAL_DATE, ie.ITEM_NUMBER, ie.GROUP_NAME, ie.TEMPLATE, ie.INVENTORY_TYPE, ii.T_SUPPLIER, ii.T_SUPPLIER_LOT, ii.T_ARRIVAL_DATE, ii.T_NUM_CONTAINER, ie.QUANTITY, ie.UNITS, ii.T_CONTAINER, ii.T_MAKER, ii.T_PROD_DATE, ii.C_MANU_EXP_DT, ii.T_EXPIRATION_DATE, ii.T_NOTE, ii.C_INV_GRADE, ie.C_DISPATCH_BY, ie.C_DISPATCHED_QTY, ie.C_DISPATCHED_TO, ie.C_DISPATCH_DATE, ie.C_DISPATCHED_YN, ie.C_INV_ACTIVE, ie.T_USE_START_DATE, ie.C_RECEIVED_BY, ie.C_RECEIVED_DATE, ie.C_SOURCE_INV_ENT, ie.T_RETEST_DATE, ie.C_TRANS_REMARK, ie.C_PRINT_LABEL1, ie.C_PRINT_LABEL2, ie.C_CREATED_BY FROM INVENTORY_ITEM ii INNER JOIN INVENTORY_ENTRY ie ON ii.ITEM_NUMBER = ie.ITEM_NUMBER WHERE ie.EXPIRATION_DATE > '2024-03-18' AND ( ie.T_EXPIRATION_DATE > '2024-03-18' OR ie.T_EXPIRATION_DATE IS NULL ) AND ie.INVENTORY_TYPE LIKE '%STD%' AND ie.T_DISPOSAL_DATE IS NULL AND ie.GROUP_NAME = '2004' AND ii.STOCK LIKE '%RS_%';

training_data.requirement: We required samples of All group details where Analysis: BB_ORGANISM_USED_1 is used. Provided list was only from PRD, we required from both Production and Training environment. Please share list of PRD and Training samples of All group details where Analysis: BB_ORGANISM_USED_1 is used. [Sample ID Text ID Analysis Template Login Date Login By]
training_data.sql_query: select distinct s.SAMPLE_NUMBER, s.TEXT_ID, r.ANALYSIS, s.TEMPLATE, s.LOGIN_BY, s.LOGIN_DATE from sample s, Result r, ANALYSIS a where r.SAMPLE_NUMBER = s.SAMPLE_NUMBER and r.ANALYSIS = a.NAME and a.DESCRIPTION like '%ORGANISM%USED%' and s.TEXT_ID like 'BB%';

training_data.requirement: what are columns of analysis table in LIMS
training_data.sql_query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'ANALYSIS';
